St. Jude's Parish has a Catholic Book Club meeting monthly, 2nd Monday of the month at 7:30 p.m. For July we're reading "Philosophy 101 by Socrates" by Peter Kreeft; For August, "The Screwtape Letters" by C. S. Lewis.
Our Lady Queen of Peace Prayer Group Mondays (except holiday Mondays) at 7:05 p.m.

First Friday Adoration from 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. Rosary for Vocations: 9:30 a.m. Saturday Rosary for the sick: 7:10 p.m. Tuesdays Rosary and Benediction with the Blessed Sacrament: 4:00 p.m. Sundays of May and October Vespers and Benediction with the Blessed Sacrament: 4:00 p.m. Sundays of Lent and Advent Stations of the Cross: Lenten Fridays at 7:00 p.m
